content:
WebControlToolboxItem Class

In this Article

Provides a base class for a Web server control ToolboxItem.

Syntax

Declaration

public class WebControlToolboxItem : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem
  • WebControlToolboxItem

Remarks

WebControlToolboxItem provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls. This class extends ToolboxItem and provides the following additional methods:

  • GetToolAttributeValue gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item.

  • GetToolHtml gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control.

  • GetToolType gets the type of the associated runtime component.

Constructors summary

Initializes a new instance of the WebControlToolboxItem class.

Creates a new instance of the WebControlToolboxItem class using the provided type.
WebControlToolboxItem(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

Creates a new instance of the WebControlToolboxItem class using the provided SerializationInfo object and StreamingContext.

Methods summary

CreateComponentsCore(IDesignerHost)

Creates objects from each type contained in this ToolboxItem, and adds them to the specified designer.
Deserialize(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.
GetToolAttributeValue(IDesignerHost,Type)

Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.
GetToolHtml(IDesignerHost)

Gets the HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
GetToolType(IDesignerHost)

Gets the type of this toolbox item.
Initialize(Type)

Initializes this toolbox item.
Serialize(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.

Constructors

  • WebControlToolboxItem()

    Initializes a new instance of the WebControlToolboxItem class.

    public WebControlToolboxItem ();

    Remarks

    The DisplayName is set to a short version of the type name.

  • WebControlToolboxItem(Type)

    Creates a new instance of the WebControlToolboxItem class using the provided type.

    public WebControlToolboxItem (Type type);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The Type of the tool for this toolbox item.

    Remarks

    The DisplayName is set to a short version of the type name.

  • WebControlToolboxItem(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

    Creates a new instance of the WebControlToolboxItem class using the provided SerializationInfo object and StreamingContext.

    protected WebControlToolboxItem (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

    Parameters

    • info
      SerializationInfo

      A SerializationInfo object containing information needed to instantiate the Web control through deserialization.

    • context
      StreamingContext

      A StreamingContext object.

Methods

  • CreateComponentsCore(IDesignerHost)

    Creates objects from each type contained in this ToolboxItem, and adds them to the specified designer.

    protected override System.ComponentModel.IComponent[] CreateComponentsCore (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host);

    Parameters

    • host
      IDesignerHost

      The IDesignerHost for the current design document.

    Returns

    • IComponent[]

      An array of created IComponent objects.

    Exceptions

    • Exception

      The CreateComponentsCore method is only available in Windows Forms.

    Remarks

    CreateComponentsCore always throws an exception, indicating that the method is inherited from ToolboxItem and only intended for use with Windows Forms.

  • Deserialize(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

    Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.

    protected override void Deserialize (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

    Parameters

    • info
      SerializationInfo

      The SerializationInfo that describes the WebControlToolboxItem.

    • context
      StreamingContext

      A StreamingContext that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.

  • GetToolAttributeValue(IDesignerHost,Type)

    Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.

    public object GetToolAttributeValue (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, Type attributeType);

    Parameters

    • host
      IDesignerHost

      The IDesignerHost for the current design document.

    • attributeType
      Type

      The type of attribute to retrieve the value of.

    Returns

    • Object

      The value of the specified type of attribute.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentException

      The attributeType parameter is not a PersistChildrenAttribute.

    Remarks

    The default implementation will throw an ArgumentException if the attributeType parameter is anything other than a PersistChildrenAttribute.

  • GetToolHtml(IDesignerHost)

    Gets the HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.

    public string GetToolHtml (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host);

    Parameters

    • host
      IDesignerHost

      The IDesignerHost for the current design document.

    Returns

    • String

      The HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.

  • GetToolType(IDesignerHost)

    Gets the type of this toolbox item.

    public Type GetToolType (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host);

    Parameters

    • host
      IDesignerHost

      The IDesignerHost for the current design document.

    Returns

    • Type

      The Type of this toolbox item.

  • Initialize(Type)

    Initializes this toolbox item.

    public override void Initialize (Type type);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The Type of the Web server control toolbox item.

  • Serialize(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

    Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.

    protected override void Serialize (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

    Parameters

    • info
      SerializationInfo

      The SerializationInfo used to save the state of the WebControlToolboxItem.

    • context
      StreamingContext

      A StreamingContext that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
